mapper.insert:
insert into Doc_Order_Details ( customerid, orderno, orderlineno, linestatus, sku,
alternativesku,
lotnum,
pickzone,
location,
qtyordered, qtyordered_each, qtysoftallocated, qtysoftallocated_each, qtyallocated, qtyallocated_each, qtypicked, qtypicked_each, qtyshipped, qtyshipped_each, uom, packid, softallocationrule, allocationrule, rotationid,
notes,
grossweight,
cubic,
price,
netweight, addtime, addwho, edittime, editwho, kitreferenceno, onestepallocation) values ( #{customerid}, #{orderno}, #{orderlineno}, '00', #{sku},
#{alternativesku},
#{lotnum},
#{pickzone},
#{location},
#{qtyordered}, #{qtyordered}, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'EA', #{packid}, 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD',
#{notes},
#{grossweight},
#{cubic},
#{price},
0, sysdate, #{addwho}, sysdate, #{editwho}, 0, 'Y')
mapper.update:
update Doc_Order_Details set sku=#{sku},
alternativesku=#{alternativesku},
qtyordered=#{qtyordered}, qtyordered_each=#{qtyordered}, packid=#{packid},
grossweight=#{grossweight},
cubic=#{cubic},
price=#{price},
lotnum=#{lotnum},
pickzone=#{pickzone},
location=#{location},
notes=#{notes},
edittime=sysdate, editwho=#{editwho} where orderno=#{orderno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and orderlineno=#{orderlineno, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update Doc_Order_Details set
addwho=#{addwho},
allocationrule=#{allocationrule},
alternativesku=#{alternativesku},
comminglesku=#{comminglesku},
cubic=#{cubic},
customerid=#{customerid},
d_edi_01=#{dEdi01},
d_edi_02=#{dEdi02},
d_edi_03=#{dEdi03},

d_edi_05=#{dEdi05},
d_edi_06=#{dEdi06},
d_edi_07=#{dEdi07},
d_edi_08=#{dEdi08},
d_edi_09=#{dEdi09},
d_edi_10=#{dEdi10},
d_edi_11=#{dEdi11},
d_edi_12=#{dEdi12},
d_edi_13=#{dEdi13},
d_edi_14=#{dEdi14},
d_edi_15=#{dEdi15},
d_edi_16=#{dEdi16},
d_edi_17=#{dEdi17},
d_edi_18=#{dEdi18},
d_edi_19=#{dEdi19},
d_edi_20=#{dEdi20},
edittime=#{edittime},
editwho=#{editwho},
erpcancelflag=#{erpcancelflag},
freegift=#{freegift},
fullcaselotcontrol=#{fullcaselotcontrol},
grossweight=#{grossweight},
kitreferenceno=#{kitreferenceno},
kitsku=#{kitsku},
linestatus=#{linestatus},
location=#{location},
locgroup1=#{locgroup1},
locgroup2=#{locgroup2},
lotatt01=#{lotatt01},
lotatt02=#{lotatt02},
lotatt03=#{lotatt03},
lotatt04=#{lotatt04},
lotatt05=#{lotatt05},
lotatt06=#{lotatt06},
lotatt07=#{lotatt07},
lotatt08=#{lotatt08},
lotatt09=#{lotatt09},
lotatt10=#{lotatt10},
lotatt11=#{lotatt11},
lotatt12=#{lotatt12},
lotnum=#{lotnum},
netweight=#{netweight},
notes=#{notes},
onestepallocation=#{onestepallocation},
orderlineno=#{orderlineno},
orderlinereferenceno=#{orderlinereferenceno},
orderlotcontrol=#{orderlotcontrol},
orderno=#{orderno},
packid=#{packid},
pickzone=#{pickzone},
piecelotcontrol=#{piecelotcontrol},
price=#{price},
qtyallocated=#{qtyallocated},
qtyallocated_each=#{qtyallocatedEach},
qtyordered=#{qtyordered},
qtyordered_each=#{qtyorderedEach},
qtypicked=#{qtypicked},
qtypicked_each=#{qtypickedEach},
qtyreleased=#{qtyreleased},
qtyshipped=#{qtyshipped},
qtyshipped_each=#{qtyshippedEach},
qtysoftallocated=#{qtysoftallocated},
qtysoftallocated_each=#{qtysoftallocatedEach},
referencelineno=#{referencelineno},
rotationid=#{rotationid},
salesorderlineno=#{salesorderlineno},
salesorderno=#{salesorderno},
sku=#{sku},
softallocationrule=#{softallocationrule},
traceid=#{traceid},
uom=#{uom},
userdefine1=#{userdefine1},
userdefine2=#{userdefine2},
userdefine3=#{userdefine3},
userdefine4=#{userdefine4},
userdefine5=#{userdefine5},
userdefine6=#{userdefine6},
zonegroup=#{zonegroup},
where addtime=#{addtime}
mapper.delete: delete from Doc_Order_Details where orderno = #{orderno} and orderlineno = #{orderlineno}
mapper.select: select count(1) from Doc_Order_Details where orderno = #{condition.orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select a.customerid, a.orderno, a.orderlineno, a.linestatus, c.codename_c as linestatusName, a.sku, b.descr_c as skuName, b.descr_e as skuNameE, a.alternativesku, a.packid, a.qtyordered, a.qtyallocated, a.qtypicked, a.qtyshipped, a.cubic, a.grossweight, a.price, a.pickzone, a.location, a.lotnum, a.addwho, a.addtime from Doc_Order_Details a, Bas_Sku b, Bas_Codes c where a.customerid = b.customerid and a.sku = b.sku and a.linestatus = c.code and c.codeid = 'SO_STS' and a.orderno = #{condition.orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) f where 1 = 1
${limitClause}
select ifnull(max(orderLineno),0) from Doc_Order_Details where orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
